display.title: Acquire: mysticalagriculture:inferium_watering_can
description: The &&aWatering Can&&r is used to increase the speed that crops grow. Higher tiers have a larger area of effect. To use this, fill it up with some water by right clicking some water, then hold right click near your crops to water them!
Tip: You can shift-right click while looking in the air with the watering can to enable auto-watering.
